::Nemean Hydra::

    From a lava pit one head arose, then another, and ano=
ther, and so on until there was seven heads above the surface. Anyone in th=
e area would have thought they were of different beasts, but then the rest =
of the creature crawled from the lava. It stood there admiring himself. He =
then tried to transform to a robot mode, it wouldn't work. But he did trans=
form, from a Hydra into a gaint Lion.
    In his lion mode he walked toward=
s the sent of Destrons. He was careful not to let any thing see him, and he=
 didn't want to let his secret out of being a Hydra.
